codebrains.crazysellout.System

Class Connectivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • codebrains.crazysellout.System.Connectivity

  • public class Connectivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains methods that check the connection between the app and the remote server and whether the device has enables the wifi.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Connectivity() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean RemoteServerIsReachable(android.app.Activity activityObj)
      Method that checks whether the server is reachable / available to the application.
      static void WifiEnabledCheck(android.app.Activity activityObj)
      Method that checks if the wifi of the mobile phone is enabled.

      • RemoteServerIsReachable

        public static boolean RemoteServerIsReachable(android.app.Activity activityObj)
        Method that checks whether the server is reachable / available to the application.
        Parameters:
        activityObj - The object of the activity.

      • WifiEnabledCheck

        public static void WifiEnabledCheck(android.app.Activity activityObj)
        Method that checks if the wifi of the mobile phone is enabled. If not it calls the error alert box method to display an error message and exit the application.
        Parameters:
        activityObj - The object of the activity from which the wifi service will be checked.
